entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
